name: DoppleGang
description:
1) Find your TWIN to WIN

- The Twin will move in a random direction whenever you move

- The Twin looks very similar to your but with subtle differences

2) Avoid your DOPPLEGANGERS

- The Doppelgangers look exactly like you

- Dopplegangers will copy your every move

- If they see you, they will get angery and run towards your last known location 

- if they touch you, they will kill you
